projects.title: Ceilkraft
projects.subtitle: False Ceiling & Interior Solutions
projects.description: A professional false ceiling contractor delivering high-quality ceiling installations for residential and commercial spaces with modern designs, durable materials, and expert craftsmanship.

Service Across Bengaluru - Including Gunjur, Nagegere, Varthur, Whitefield & Sarjapur Road

projects.title: Max Align Dental

projects.description: Developed from scratch using Frontend, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap 5, Responsive Design, and JavaScript to ensure complete control over design and performance.

Patient-Friendly Navigation - Clear menus and call-to-action buttons guide patients effortlessly
Integrated Features - Appointment booking, contact forms, Google Maps integration, and SEO-friendly
Secure & Scalable - Built with best practices for security and future upgrades
Engaging Visuals & Animations - Professional look that enhances user experience
